snippet: Garry Marshall’s memoir, “My Happy Days in Hollywood,” and other books about the silver screen in America and abroad.
abstract: Andy Webster reviews books My Happy Days in Hollywood: A Memoir by Garry Marshall with Lori Marshall, The Beauty of the Real: What Hollywood Can Learn From Contemporary French Actresses by Mick LaSalle, Searching for Annabel Chong: Demystifying the Legend of Singapore's Most Famous Pornstar! by Gerrie Lim, Hollywood Rides A Bike: Cycling With the Stars by Steven Rea and Hollywood Left and Right: How Movie Stars Shaped American Politics by Steven J Ross.
lead_paragraph: Garry Marshall’s memoir, “My Happy Days in Hollywood,” and other books about the silver screen in America and abroad.

headline.seo: ‘My Happy Days in Hollywood,’ by Garry Marshall, and More
